title: Create AOI
name: CreateAOI

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin
permission.description: The user must be an admin to use this endpoint

description: Create a new AOI during an instance Note: this is an internal API that is called by the websocket GPU

Body.description: The human readable name of the AOI
The checkpoint ID that created this AOI

name: DeleteAOI

permission.name: user
permission.title: User
permission.description: A user must be logged in to use this endpoint

description: Delete an existing AOI

title: Create Checkpoint
name: CreateCheckpoint

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin
permission.description: The user must be an admin to use this endpoint

description: Create a new Checkpoint during an instance Note: this is an internal API that is called by the websocket GPU

Body.description: The human readable name of the checkpoint
The ID of the parent checkpoint that was retrained off of
Named output classes & their associated colours undefined
Array of GeoJSON Multipoint geometries that were used for retraining. Length of geomms array must equals classes undefined
Array of GeoJSON FeatureCollection that were input by the user. Length of this array must equals classes undefined

permission.name: user
permission.title: User
permission.description: A user must be logged in to use this endpoint

description: Return a list of instances. Note that users can only get their own instances and use of the uid field will be pinned to their own uid. Admins can filter by any uid or none.

Query.description: The offset based on limit to return
Filter batch instances, if a boolean - show hide batch instances, if an integer, only show specific instance with a given batch id

permission.name: admin

title: Self Instance
name: SelfInstance

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin
permission.description: The user must be an admin to use this endpoint

description: A newly instantiated GPU Instance does not know what it's project id is. This API allows ONLY AN ADMIN TOKEN to fetch any instance, regardless of project

title: List Schemas
name: ListSchemas

permission.name: public
permission.title: Public
permission.description: This API endpoint does not require authentication

description:
List all JSON Schemas in use With no parameters this API will return a list of all the endpoints that have a form of schema validation If the url/method params are used, the schemas themselves are returned

Note: If url or method params are used, they must be used together

Query.description: URLEncoded URL that you want to fetch

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "id": 1432,
    "name": "I'm an AOI",
    "checkpoint_id": 1,
    "storage": true,
    "bookmarked": false
    "created": "<date>",
    "bounds": { "GeoJSON "},
    "classes": []
}
